name: Tarkus and the Orbs of Doom
overview: Tarkus and the Orbs of Doom is a puzzle game. The aim of the player is to collect 24 Orbs of Doom. There are two characters with special abilities in the game. The first character can walk on water, the second character can jump. Only the interaction of two heroes allows to complete the level. After collecting the Orb of Doom both characters must be brought to the upper left corner of the map.
